attributes.action: consider use of the public highway for an event similar to The Isle of Man TT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would involve closing small(20-100miles) "circuits" of public highway for a few days each year. This could bring many benefits with the potential of many thousand spectator crowd from around the world. 
It could also benefit road safety with the provision of a category allowing qualified and dressed "civilian" riders to learn to use their bikes in a controlled safe environment.

I hope you take this petition seriously as it would be a great event with minumal costs and great potential gains.
